00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Linq;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 using System.Drawing;
00028 #endregion
00029 
00030 namespace Utilities.Media
00031 {
00035     public class RGBHistogram
00036     {
00037         #region Constructors
00038 
00039 
00040 
00041         public RGBHistogram()
00042         {
00043         }
00044 
00049         public RGBHistogram(Bitmap Image)
00050         {
00051             LoadImage(Image);
00052         }
00053         #endregion
00054 
00055         #region Public Functions
00056 
00057 
00058 
00059 
00060         public void LoadImage(Bitmap Image)
00061         {
00062             Width = Image.Width;
00063             Height = Image.Height;
00064             for (int x = 0; x < 256; ++x)
00065             {
00066                 R[x] = 0;
00067                 G[x] = 0;
00068                 B[x] = 0;
00069             }
00070             for (int x = 0; x < Image.Width; ++x)
00071             {
00072                 for (int y = 0; y < Image.Height; ++y)
00073                 {
00074                     Color TempColor = Image.GetPixel(x, y);
00075                     ++R[(int)TempColor.R];
00076                     ++G[(int)TempColor.G];
00077                     ++B[(int)TempColor.B];
00078                 }
00079             }
00080         }
00081 
00085         public void Normalize()
00086         {
00087             float TotalPixels=Width*Height;
00088             for (int x = 0; x < 256; ++x)
00089             {
00090                 R[x] /= TotalPixels;
00091                 G[x] /= TotalPixels;
00092                 B[x] /= TotalPixels;
00093             }
00094         }
00095 
00099         public void Equalize()
00100         {
00101             float TotalPixels = Width * Height;
00102 
00103             float PreviousR = R[0];
00104             R[0] = R[0] * 256 / TotalPixels;
00105             float PreviousG = G[0];
00106             G[0] = G[0] * 256 / TotalPixels;
00107             float PreviousB = B[0];
00108             B[0] = B[0] * 256 / TotalPixels;
00109             for (int x = 1; x < 256; ++x)
00110             {
00111                 PreviousR += R[x];
00112                 PreviousG += G[x];
00113                 PreviousB += B[x];
00114                 R[x] = PreviousR * 256 / TotalPixels;
00115                 G[x] = PreviousG * 256 / TotalPixels;
00116                 B[x] = PreviousB * 256 / TotalPixels;
00117             }
00118             Width = 256;
00119             Height = 1;
00120         }
00121         #endregion
00122 
00123         #region Private Values
00124         private int Width;
00125         private int Height;
00126         #endregion
00127 
00128         #region Public Properties
00129 
00130 
00131 
00132         public float[] R
00133         {
00134             get { return _R; }
00135             set { _R = value; }
00136         }
00137         private float[] _R = new float[256];
00138 
00142         public float[] G
00143         {
00144             get { return _G; }
00145             set { _G = value; }
00146         }
00147         private float[] _G = new float[256];
00148 
00152         public float[] B
00153         {
00154             get { return _B; }
00155             set { _B = value; }
00156         }
00157         private float[] _B = new float[256];
00158         #endregion
00159     }
